h2_title: Where to Find the Daoist Mi
content: While it may sound like he's asking you to seek out a Worm Practitioner, in reality any of the Daoists you defeat in this hamlet has a chance to drop the item he seeks. We'll clear the village out before returning to him, but you may also need to rest and respawn them if you don't find one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist_Mi.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist Mi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Daoist Mi'.
The content is as follows:
While it may sound like he's asking you to seek out a Worm Practitioner, in reality any of the Daoists you defeat in this hamlet has a chance to drop the item he seeks. We'll clear the village out before returning to him, but you may also need to rest and respawn them if you don't find one.
